channel.title: Nividia Help
channel.description: [b]A friend of mine has the source Nividia and in Commands.java the "master" command nor the "pure" seem to work, I have tried many times to fix it and still can not come to a conclusion on how to fix it. [/b]

item.title: Nividia Help
item.dc:creator: @dillktm65 dillktm65
item.description:
@dillktm65 wrote:

I compile and it say’s the last } needs to be moved but I don’t know where.

Read full topic

item.title: Nividia Help
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Ripped this right out of my server. No credits to me OFC.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("tank")) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(1210422, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("zerk")) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(65000, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(0, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(136594, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, i); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Nividia Help
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Make sure that there is no exception saying that “This person” = rights 3 or whatever. If so, find that name and change it.
